data.title: LITAN
data.meta_description: It's time for another announcement! data.text: It's time for another announcement! This title is once again one of our great personal discoveries that went directly on our list of favorite films, so we just had to release it. Jean-Pierre Mocky directed many films but only one true blue horror film -- and he managed to deliver an absolute genre masterpiece. We're talking about LITAN from 1982, one of the few films that succeed in creating a nightmarish, dense atmosphere that captures you right from the first minute and never lets go. Unfortunately, we're not allowed English options on this release.
